text: The Adventures of Dollie is a 1908 American silent movie directed by D. W. GriffithTHE ADVENTURES OF DOLLIETom Gunning. D.W. Griffith and the Origins of American Narrative Film and stars Arthur V. Johnson, Linda Arvidson, and Gladys Egan. ==Actors== * Arthur V. Johnson as Father * Linda Arvidson as Mother * Gladys Egan as Dollie * Charles Inslee as Gypsy * Madeline West as Gypsy's wife ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Adventures of Dollie
